| History                 = The Speedsters Union was a union made of speedsters. Three of those speedsters, [[Momenta (Earth-616)|Momenta]], [[Zig-Zag (Earth-616)|Zig-Zag]], [[Whiz Kid (Earth-616)|Whiz Kid]], were hired by the law firm of [[Goodman, Lieber, Kurtzberg & Holliway (Earth-616)|Goodman, Lieber, Kurtzberg & Holliway]] to operate the mail room effectively. When they were hired, it was agreed that they'd not be placed in harm's way, since, when injured, most speedsters bleed out at super speed.{{r|She-Hulk Vol 1 11}}
